html:
8.22.24  1:13 pm   are you a fan of the hitchkiker's guide series, or does it just annoy you everyone seems to only know one thing from it?

      i've never been exposed to any part of it other than the 42 meme. i recently watched the author tell a cookie story in the 1980s, it was a cool story. i wouldn't be surprised if the book is cool but i just don't know

8.22.24  12:06 pm   i got high as fuck yesterday and watched ur vids it  was so fun

      whether or not i'll ever admit it, you are possibly my target audience

8.22.24  11:50 am   What's the weirdest musical notes or chord that you can think of?

      to create musical weirdness, you have to do more than just name notes or chords. you have to demonstrate it in audio form

8.22.24  11:25 am   why is the q green?

      to draw attention to itself as the first letter of the word, despite not appearing all the way on the left

8.22.24  11:12 am   what is your greatest contribution to the world?

      i made it a little taller

8.22.24  10:20 am   what do you think of time?

      i have to admit it's pretty convenient

8.22.24  10:00 am   What do you find strange about people saying your name when they speak to you?

      don't take my word for it, try doing that to every person you talk to today and see for yourself

8.22.24  6:13 am   Ever notice conversations can sometime be like music or a bit like playing in a band with some improv?

      yes

8.22.24  4:02 am   my mind is not how i want it; but it could be worse

      that sounds like a sitcom

8.22.24  3:48 am   do you ever think

      yes, that's one of my hobbies

8.22.24  2:08 am   I adore the chord that I don't know the name of, but consists of these notes: C E A# D#' - it's just Super jazzy.

     that's commonly called C7#9, and it's traditionally associated with jimi hendrix

     Have you used it (in any rotation) in any of your songs?

     sure, i use it a lot

8.22.24  1:24 am   have you ever answered a question you asked yourself in this ueqstions form

      no

8.22.24  1:20 am   Can you spin a basketball on your finger?

      possibly

8.22.24  12:38 am   how to unlearn something?

      as long as the original thing is not true, just learn something true in place of it, and continue living with that new true thing for a while. eventually you will forget about the original false thing. it will be much more difficult if the original thing actually is true

8.22.24  12:24 am   have you abandoned reality once you blew up with history?

      you have the story exactly backwards. before the history videos, that page didn't exist. the first thing i did after history of japan was i created the reality page and produced the initial batch of about 200 of them. then it actually wasn't until after the next video that i got to work on producing the next major batch. As a matter of fact, the whole construct of the reality page doesn't really work very well unless it's in the context of success. having success is what tends to inspire me to release that sort of material, to show a bit of behind the scenes

8.22.24  12:10 am   I forgot most of the truth do you remember any of it

      i'm reminded of it sometimes when i'm not expecting

8.21.24  11:28 pm   can we just give america to canada, i think they'd do a better job with us

      so then i'm assuming south america would be renamed to south canada

8.21.24  11:21 pm   How do you feel about colors?

      fine

8.21.24  10:20 pm   how overwhelming is this question

      not at all

8.21.24  10:20 pm   about how long does it take you to write the core of a song? by core i mean you're singing all of the words and playing all of the chords on a keyboard.

      the writing process takes anywhere between the duration of the song and 3 days. sometimes the best ones take the longest to write. sometimes the best ones are the quickest to write

8.21.24  10:11 pm   what do you think of the chord progression c c#?

      too good. don't use

8.21.24  9:34 pm   How confident are you that your next batch of videos will finally have your favourite one

      each one needs to become my favorite, during the time of production. after it released, it becomes more important that the next one in production assumes that status, while in production

8.21.24  8:50 pm   how does one create?

      the way you're gonna do it

8.21.24  8:05 pm   Have you ever said the phrase "you don't wanna pick the pick cause the pick is a pick and the shovel isn't a pick and if you pick the pick the pick the pick the shovel isn't the pick!" Before?

      no i haven't

8.21.24  6:38 pm   what is the oldest question you remember answering?

      this one. just kidding, i remember 3 more before this also

8.21.24  6:18 pm   Do you live in a big old castle on top of a big old hill and whenever a camera pans to an outdoor shot of your castle there's a lightning strike and raven caw? 

      no, you're thinking of someone else

8.21.24  5:20 pm   should i shower?

      sure

8.21.24  4:54 pm   do you want a tungsten cube

      no, but that doesn't mean they aren't good

8.21.24  4:40 pm   hey bill, did you know that abraham lincoln was a wrestler?

      did you

8.21.24  4:38 pm   Do you feel like some of the questions on this website are made to provoke a certain response out of you, rather than trying to learn about you/receive advice?

      those are 2, among many of the common reasons

8.21.24  3:28 pm   how often do you name your belongings after your loved ones

      i don't think i've ever done that

8.21.24  2:51 pm   a month or so ago I asked if thoughts are just justifications for feelings, and you answered that feelings are also used to justify thoughts, and I keep thinking about that but don't understand.  what's an example of someone justifying their thought with a feeling?

      that's the whole essence of the marketing department

8.21.24  2:20 pm   What does MSNBC stand for? 

      measured, sensible, nice, boysterous, calm

8.21.24  1:50 pm   Are there native people from Antarctica? 

      i don't think so

8.21.24  12:01 pm   what's your favourite idea?

      there's only one idea. so it would be that one

8.21.24  11:53 am   Do you ever cry while watching your videos and listening to your songs because they are so beautiful? (Sometimes I do. {Just a little bit though}).

      every couple of years, someone comes along and convinces me they are good. then for a brief moment i stop being so afraid they're not good, and i watch all of them. this moment then fuels me for the next couple of years

8.21.24  11:09 am   why do you like tuesdays so much

      they are perfect. at least they are supposed to be perfect, if they're not it's not my fault

8.21.24  10:45 am   how long does it take a body builder to build a body?

      they don't build the original body, but they develop the one they have. they can continue doing that for any amount of time

8.21.24  10:37 am   Hello Bill, could you elaborate on the fact that you are able to finish songs started many many years ago, and still feel confident that they sound good and represent who you are today ? i think it's an impressive feat in many regards. cheers.

      at some point i discovered some important doctrine (or i may have hallucinated it or something) but essentially it's like a basic artistic property of the universe which states that any piece of something can be made into everything, at any given time. another way of looking at it is, there's never officially any wrong direction you can go. it's sort of like the artist freedom principle. i didn't make this up, this is like a basic awesome thing to discover, and when artists discover it i feel like they are very happy after that point. actually now that i think about it, that's what most of my songs are about. just being excited about having discovered that

8.21.24  7:10 am   What is the most advanced equation you know?

      a=a

8.21.24  6:24 am   do you intend to ever write a long story of which the center point isn't music, kind of like "2 friends on the beach" but much longer?

      there is something of a marathon of this type of content currently in production

8.21.24  6:24 am   Are you a big fan of reality?

      yes

8.21.24  5:48 am   If a cat barks and a dog meows has something gone wrong?

      not really

8.21.24  5:38 am   thoughts on the hegemony of the coastal elites

      that's a very popular halloween costume

8.21.24  3:14 am   does wearing soft clothes make you sick?

      no

8.21.24  1:04 am   are you allergic to capitalization (i am)

      no

8.20.24  11:42 pm   what's your favorite?

      it's the same as everyone else's

8.20.24  11:25 pm   if you had to pick a song slash album that is quote "really good or mildly okay at what it's attempting to convey slash explain" what would it be and why?

      that pretty much describes all of them

8.20.24  11:16 pm   how do you feel about puzzles

      good

8.20.24  10:10 pm   Did you know that 111, 222, 333, 444, 555, 666, 777, 888, and 999 are all divisible by 37?

      yes i knew that. i've talked about that on here several times
